p: When investigating if other environmental variables measured on-site in India affected CT max, aside from site temperature, we found a negative relationship between conductivity and CT max (β = −0.0045 ± 0.001, F 1,78 = 7.23, P = 0.04, Fig. 6) and only 4% of the variance was explained by site number. This negative relationship is, however, driven by the site with the highest conductivity (site 12; 218 μS cm −1) as there is no significant relationship if this site is removed (β = −0.0034 ± 0.001, F 1,70 = 1.79, P = 0.24).
